import React, { createContext, useState } from 'react' import styles from './Planner.module.css' import Dashboard from './Dashboard/Dashboard' import Schedule from './Schedule/Schedule' import BottomBar from './BottomBar/BottomBar' import plans from './degreeCourses.json' // Import the JSON data // Define the context export const PlansContext = createContext() export default function Planner() { const [selectedPlanID, setSelectedPlanID] = useState("1") // Default to the first plan const [courseInfoList, setCourseInfoList] = useState(["02003", "01003", "10240"]) // Courses Details const [selectedCourseInfoNr, setSelectedCourseInfoNr] = useState("01003") // Courses Details const value = { plans, selectedPlanID, setSelectedPlanID, courseInfoList, setCourseInfoList, selectedCourseInfoNr, setSelectedCourseInfoNr } return (
{courseInfoList.length > 0 && }
) }
